3442.verse: وَإِذَا|And when|85|92|96$مَسَّ|touches|73|88|3309$ٱلنَّاسَ|men|75|90|446$ضُرٌّ|hardship,|80|95|13736$دَعَوْاْ|they call|77|92|11318$رَبَّهُم|their Lord|83|98|3649$مُّنِيبِينَ|turning|82|97|13735$إِلَيْهِ|to Him.|67|74|296$ثُمَّ|Then|53|64|293$إِذَآ|when|55|78|1370$أَذَاقَهُم|He causes them to taste|185|208|13737$مِّنْهُ|from Him|77|100|571$رَحْمَةً|Mercy|78|101|2636$إِذَا|behold!|68|91|1370$فَرِيقٌ|A party|72|83|729$مِّنْهُم|of them|71|157|730$بِرَبِّهِمْ|with their Lord|116|288|5406$يُشْرِكُونَ|associate partners|143|229|7075$

3443.verse: لِيَكْفُرُواْ|So as to deny|113|134|9992$بِمَآ|[in] what,|86|127|43$ءَاتَيْنَـٰهُمْ‌ۚ|We have granted them.|177|218|1841$فَتَمَتَّعُواْ|Then enjoy,|99|140|9993$فَسَوْفَ|but soon|85|106|3931$تَعْلَمُونَ|you will know.|113|113|212$

3444.verse: أَمْ|Or|38|46|62$أَنزَلْنَا|have We sent|112|128|929$عَلَيْهِمْ|to them|76|92|22$سُلْطَـٰنًا|an authority|101|117|3368$فَهُوَ|and it|58|74|1591$يَتَكَلَّمُ|speaks|67|83|13738$بِمَا|of what|71|87|43$كَانُواْ|they were|87|95|94$بِهِۦ|with Him|76|323|204$يُشْرِكُونَ|associating?|105|352|7075$

3445.verse: وَإِذَآ|And when|85|101|96$أَذَقْنَا ٱلنَّاسَ|We cause men to taste|176|208|8066$رَحْمَةً|mercy,|78|110|2636$فَرِحُواْ|they rejoice|99|131|5591$بِهَا‌ۖ|therein.|71|103|1203$وَإِن|But if|58|74|213$تُصِبْهُمْ|afflicts them|103|114|4218$سَيِّئَةُۢ|an evil|65|88|3221$بِمَا|for what|76|99|43$قَدَّمَتْ|have sent forth|123|146|897$أَيْدِيهِمْ|their hands,|99|122|757$إِذَا|behold!|68|91|1370$هُمْ|They|53|64|49$يَقْنَطُونَ|despair.|94|94|13739$

3447.verse: فَـَٔـاتِ|So give|69|75|13740$ذَا ٱلْقُرْبَىٰ|the relative|112|125|10317$حَقَّهُۥ|his right|73|86|6108$وَٱلْمِسْكِينَ|and the poor|116|129|10318$وَٱبْنَ ٱلسَّبِيلِ‌ۚ|and the wayfarer.|139|152|1527$ذَٲلِكَ|That|64|77|28$خَيْرٌ|(is) best|76|82|520$لِّلَّذِينَ|for those who|112|126|750$يُرِيدُونَ|desire|94|122|4112$وَجْهَ|(the) Countenance|146|174|2999$ٱللَّهِ‌ۖ|(of) Allah.|86|114|606$وَأُوْلَـٰٓئِكَ|And those,|96|124|55$هُمُ|they|50|64|56$ٱلْمُفْلِحُونَ|(are) the successful ones.|195|195|57$

3449.verse: ٱللَّهُ|Allah|53|70|123$ٱلَّذِى|(is) the One Who|134|167|138$خَلَقَكُمْ|created you,|105|138|191$ثُمَّ|then|50|83|293$رَزَقَكُمْ|He provided (for) you,|167|200|13746$ثُمَّ|then|50|67|293$يُمِيتُكُمْ|He will cause you to die|178|185|294$ثُمَّ|then|50|64|293$يُحْيِيكُمْ‌ۖ|He will give you life.|152|166|295$هَلْ|Is (there)|84|98|1829$مِن|any|50|64|53$شُرَكَآئِكُم|(of) your partners|139|146|8143$مَّن|who|50|58|76$يَفْعَلُ|does|65|82|815$مِن|of|50|67|53$ذَٲلِكُم|that|69|86|488$مِّن|any|50|67|53$شَىْءٍ‌ۚ|thing?|69|86|186$سُبْحَـٰنَهُۥ|Glory be to Him|121|138|1080$وَتَعَـٰلَىٰ|and exalted is He|134|142|5903$عَمَّا|above what|98|325|724$يُشْرِكُونَ|they associate.|123|350|7075$

3442.verse: And when adversity touches the people, they call upon their Lord, turning in repentance to Him. Then when He lets them taste mercy from Him, at once a party of them associate others with their Lord,

3443.verse: So that they will deny what We have granted them. Then enjoy yourselves, for you are going to know.

3444.verse: Or have We sent down to them an authority, and it speaks of what they were associating with Him?

3445.verse: And when We let the people taste mercy, they rejoice therein, but if evil afflicts them for what their hands have put forth, immediately they despair.

3446.verse: Do they not see that Allah extends provision for whom He wills and restricts [it]? Indeed, in that are signs for a people who believe.

3447.verse: So give the relative his right, as well as the needy and the traveler. That is best for those who desire the countenance of Allah, and it is they who will be the successful.

3448.verse: And whatever you give for interest to increase within the wealth of people will not increase with Allah. But what you give in zakah, desiring the countenance of Allah - those are the multipliers.

3449.verse: Allah is the one who created you, then provided for you, then will cause you to die, and then will give you life. Are there any of your "partners" who does anything of that? Exalted is He and high above what they associate with Him.

3450.verse: Corruption has appeared throughout the land and sea by [reason of] what the hands of people have earned so He may let them taste part of [the consequence of] what they have done that perhaps they will return [to righteousness].
